answers.answer: Hello,Diabetes can cause penile tingling. Get evaluated for your blood sugar levels and try to keep control of your diabetes. Also a peripheral artery disease (by dopplar ultrasound) and a peripheral nerve disease will have to be looked into which are caused by diabetes.I suggest you to consult an endocrinologist and get it evaluated.I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: I'm diebetic and use viagra but recently feeling my penis is numb and as if life stopped in it what could be causing all this
title: Living in hell
